attributes.action: Lewis Hamilton should be given a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Lewis is the greatest British Formula 1 driver in history and has broken multiple records over his career so far. He is also active in promoting diversity in the sport and encouraging young people to have ambition.
attributes.background: Reccomend a knighthood for Lewis Hamilton to the Queen

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
